Title: The Club
Writer: Guillermo Calderón, Pablo Larraín, Daniel Villalobos
Actors: Alfredo Castro, Roberto Farías, Antonia Zegers, Marcelo Alonso
Plot: Four catholic priests, now excommunicated, share a secluded house in a small coastal house of Chile where they are are supposed to atone for their sins. Their quiet routine, placed under the supervision of Mother Monica, is disturbed by the coming of a fifth man. The newcomer, a pedophile, appears as a most unwelcome reminder of their own tainted lives...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 18 wins & 24 nominations.
